column4: Hello. After upgrading from 10.04-> 11.. -> 12.04 this weekend i seem to have lost my Transmission client. It was in the start menu.
I see 6 transmission-xxxxxxx executables on the commandline but i have no idea wich one it is, does anyone know wich one the client is?
click the ubnutu button top left and type in transmission, right click on what comes up and put it on the unity bar
